item.title: 317 ::pickup command issues
item.dc:creator: @Aerocrash Aerocrash
item.description:
@Aerocrash wrote:

       if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
        try {
            int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
            int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sm("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sm("Unable to Connect to Items.java");
        }
    }

Thats my pickup code, my character will not pick anything up and his rights are 3. It keeps saying unable to connect to items.java :eek:

Read full topic
